bug.text: Unprintable characters in strings were escaped wrong.
There was a memory leak in CORBA::ORB::string_to_object() under certain circumstances. This was due to an base class lacking a virtual destructor.
A silly memory leak was introduced when omniNames was POAfied. Amazing it took this long before someone noticed :-)

bug.summary: Incorrect result when assigning unsigned long long consts
bug.text: A cut-and-paste error caused the value of some unsigned long long consts to be damaged.

bug.summary: Deadlock when a worker thread can't be started
bug.text: An attempt to re-lock a locked mutex lead to a deadlock when thread creation failed.

bug.summary: Wrong _out type for fixed size structs/unions
Refcount not incremented in find_POA with AdapterActivator.
bug.text: In the case that find_POA() activated the POA using an AdapterActivator, it failed to increment the POA's reference count.

bug.summary: Incorrect omniidl output with repeated names in nested scopes

bug.text: Multi-threaded access to servant activators could cause all sorts of grief.

bug.summary: HPUX 11.00 shared libraries are not build with -Wl,+s
bug.text: HPUX 11.00 shared libraries are not build with -Wl,+s which enable SHLIB_PATH searching at runtime.

bug.summary: nameclt fails when passed a nil BindingIterator
bug.text: Some Naming services return a nil BindingIterator if a context is empty. nameclt would blindly dereference the nil in this case.
